summary:
Numb bum??
Tired of having to ask Lydia to help with those splinters you just can't reach?
Lets face it, Skyrim is a cold, hard place, especially when all you have to sit on is bare wood!!
Enough (screams our backsides), throw a pelt on it why don't you!!

Pelted Chairs!
descriptionHtml:
Pelted Chairs V.1.0
Skyrim SE version available [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2047/?]HERE[/url]

Numb bum??
Tired of having to ask Lydia to help with those splinters you just can't reach?
Lets face it, Skyrim is a cold, hard place, especially when all you have to sit on is bare wood!!
Enough (screams our backsides), throw a pelt on it why don't you!!

Pelted Chairs!
Offers a small selection of chairs (and one bench) that have pelts on them which replace the original "vanilla" chairs throughout the game!
Thats it! What more is there to say? It's chairs, but not as you know them!


Installing with NMM:
Download and install using NMM, use the <Next> button to browse the available chairs then hit <Install>
Note: Installing without making any selections will still install the 2 textures that the chairs use!

Uninstalling with NMM:
Select the mod in NMM and hit the <Uninstall> button! Not much more to say on that one, is there?


To install by hand:
View the images in the accompanying <Fomod> folder to view the available options, once you have decided on your selection(s) copy the appropriate .nif(s) from the <Data/Sets> folder(s) to the path(s) in your Skyrim install as stated below for each set type.
Note: If these paths do not exist you must create them. Only use one of each type.

Common:
SkyrimInstallFolder/Data/Meshes/Furniture/Common/CommonChair01.nif

Noble (01 & 02):
SkyrimInstallFolder/Data/Meshes/Furniture/Noble/NobleChair01.nif

Orcish:
SkyrimInstallFolder/Data/Meshes/Furniture/OrcFurniture/OrcChair01.nif

Upper (01 & Bench):
SkyrimInstallFolder/Data/Meshes/Clutter/Upperclass/UpperChair01.nif

Wooden:
SkyrimInstallFolder/Data/Meshes/Furniture/WoodenChair01.nif


Then copy the two .dds texture files from <Data/Sets/Textures/PeltedChairs> to:
SkyrimInstallFolder/Data/Textures/PeltedChairs/leatherhide01.dds & silver-fox-002.dds


To uninstall by hand simply delete the files you copied across!


berticus0001

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

author: berticus0001
